title: I Just promoted to Silver V!
body: I'm finally out of Bronze! INTO THE SUN WOOHOO! I played more than 200 games trying to get to silver and I finally promoted. Solo q'ing has been quite a struggle.{{champion:89}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:86}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
out of the quagmire into the deep mud!

Congratulations!
Congratulations and good luck with future climbing!
